casebody.data:
BARBEE
v.
WHAP, P.A., et al. 315P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Michael S. Eldredge, Attorney at Law, Lexington, David J. Dickens, Attorney at Law, Orange, VA, for Barbee, Judith, et al. Linda L. Helms, Lorin J. Lapidus, Attorneys at Law, Winston-Salem, for Whap, P.A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of October 2017 *574by Plaintiffs to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
